Wallets

There are many different ways to use Commodity Price Coins and thus there are many types of wallets:

(Please research and select best wallet to suit your needs)

  • Online wallet

    Wallets that can be accessed worldwide on the internet from any connected device.

  • Software wallet

    Wallet applications easily downloaded to any computing or phone devices.

  • Hardware wallet

    Physical devices that are designed to secure CPC's.

  • Paper wallet

    CPC private keys printed from an offline computer.
